extendedInfo.description: The cold chain never stops. Neither do we.Connect to over 550 service centers for your refrigeration unit across Europe, Middle East and Africa.Carrier Transicold Locator will enable you to get in touch with the nearest service centre from your position or consult our full list of centres across Europe, Middle East and Africa. You will be able to navigate to the centre, get contact details and opening hours. In case of emergency, our 24h assistance will also be reachable to help you deliver your goods in perfect condition.Download our application to get:List of all Carrier Transicold Europe service centresNearest service centre from your locationMap of the centreNavigation to this centreOpening hours24h assistance numberCentre activity (Trailer, Truck, LCV)Contact details of the centreE-mail sending to this centre

reviews.title: Thanks!
reviews.comment: This app is of great help!
reviews.author: A Google User
